entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Pointe-à-la-Croix
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:41 PM EST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Charlo 3:00 PM AST Saturday 14 January 2023
Temperature: -2.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 71 %
Wind Chill: -4
Dewpoint: -7.0°C
Wind: NW 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill minus 13 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clearing. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High minus 5.
